title: Ramly Howell w/TTT back for trade (poor)

posts.post_title: Ramly Howell w/TTT back for trade (poor)
posts.post_content:
I have a Ramly of Harry Howell with the rarer TTT back for trade. In trade I would be looking for prewar Red Sox types or another tougher type (Red Cross etc.) but am open to all trades.
                                              Thanks,
                                                Steve

Bump...still looking to trade and will entertain offers.
